articles.title: Will continue building strategic partnership with India: Russian policy document - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The document emphasised the importance of Russia deepening relations and coordination with sovereign centres of power on the Eurasian continent. | Latest News India
articles.content: NEW DELHI:Russia will continue building its strategic partnership with India to expand cooperation in all areas, according to an updated national foreign policy concept approved by President Vladimir… [+2674 chars]

articles.title: C. auris : An urgent threat to US hospitals - Healio
articles.description: Candida auris is an emerging multidrug-resistant yeast causing nosocomial infections. First identified in 2009 in Japan, C. auris has now also been isolated in North America, South America, Europe, Africa, the Middle East and East Asia.
